page.title: 12TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: The A46 trunk road runs through the middle of North Hykeham effectively dividing the town into two parts. This was the old route of the Roman Fosse Way,and runs from Bath to Lincoln.The traffic along it can be seen and heard from our school. A class offirst year Juniors carried out a survey of traffic travelling into Lincoln on two days in Spring 1985 and in ten minutes over 120 vehicles were counted. A new bypass is due to open in1986 to relieve North Hykeham of much of this through traffic. We hope that this busy road will be quieter then and less traffic thundering along it will make North Hykeham a better place in which to live.
